generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Avoid Mob Type Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows the entity to run away from other entities that meet the criteria specified.

fields.title: LevelSoundEvent
fields.description: The sound event to play when the mob is avoiding another mob.

fields.title: Avoid Target Xz
fields.description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this XZ Distance.

fields.title: Avoid Target Y
fields.description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this Y Distance.

fields.title: Entity Types
fields.description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to avoid.

fields.title: Check If Outnumbered
fields.description: If true, the mob will check if its outnumbered

fields.title: Cooldown
fields.description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob has to wait before selecting a target of the same type again
Conditions that make this entry in the list valid

fields.title: Domain
fields.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

fields.title: Operator
fields.description: The comparison to apply with 'value'.

fields.title: Subject
fields.description: The subject of this filter test.

fields.title: Test
fields.description: The name of the test to apply.

fields.title: Value
fields.description: The value being compared with the test.

fields.title: Max Dist
fields.description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice

fields.title: Max Flee
fields.description: Maximum distance this mob can be from the target to stop fleeing

fields.title: Max Height
fields.description: Maximum height this mob can be away to be a valid choice

fields.title: Must See
fields.description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice

fields.title: Must See Forget Duration
fields.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: Priority for this mob type

fields.title: Reevaluate Description
fields.description: If true, the mob will stop being targeted if it stops meeting any conditions.

fields.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for the sprinting speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

fields.title: Walk Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

fields.title: Ignore Visibility
fields.description: Whether or not to ignore direct line of sight while this entity is running away from other specified entities.

fields.title: Max Dist
fields.description: Maximum distance to look for an avoid target for the entity.

fields.title: Max Flee
fields.description: How many blocks away from its avoid target the entity must be for it to stop fleeing from the avoid target.

fields.title: Escape Event
fields.description: Event that is triggered when escaping from a mob.

fields.title: Probability Per Strength
fields.description: Percent chance this entity will stop avoiding another entity based on that entity's strength, where 1.0 = 100%.

fields.title: Remove Target
fields.description: Determine if we should remove target when fleeing or not.

fields.title: River Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for speed when following river. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the speed faster.

fields.title: Sound Interval
fields.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

fields.title: Sprint Distance
fields.description: How many blocks within range of its avoid target the entity must be for it to begin sprinting away from the avoid target.

fields.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for sprint speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the sprint speed faster.

fields.title: Walk Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.
